title: As Input Parameters
description: In this lab, we learn that when writing functions in Rust that take a closure as an input parameter, the closure's complete type must be annotated using one of the `traits`: `Fn`, `FnMut`, or `FnOnce`, which determine how the closure uses the captured value, either by reference, mutable reference, or value.
